name: jump-kick

effect_entries.effect: If this move misses, the user takes 1 point of damage in recoil.
If this move misses, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down.

effect:
Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A strong jumping kick. May
miss and hurt the kicker.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A strong jumping kick. May
miss and hurt the kicker.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user jumps up
high, then kicks.
If it misses, the
user hurts itself.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user jumps up
high, then strikes
with a kick. If the
kick misses, the
user hurts itself.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
